articles.author: Jihye Lee, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets mostly fall as Fed warns of recession risk triggered by banking crisis - CNBC
articles.description: Comments from the Fed erased earlier gains seen on Wall Street after the release of the U.S. consumer price index report that showed inflation cooled in March.
articles.content: Markets do not seem to have priced in a potential U.S. recession, despite forecasts that one is on the horizon, according to Alex Wolf, managing director of JPMorgan Private Bank and head of its inve… [+757 chars]

articles.title: British SAS, UK’s Elite Special Air Service Forces Could Be Operating Inside Ukraine To Battle Russia – Leaked US Intel - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Among a host of information about the Ukraine war made available by the controversial leak of Pentagon documents, there is a revelation that British special troops have been stationed in Ukraine. The leaked files have revealed that up to 50 Special Forces, mo…
